DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study determine experimentally relationship affective response exercise future exercise behavior . A secondary goal examine potential mediator moderator relationship , specifically four variable consider contribute volitional control exercise behavior - planning , attention , resource commitment , affect regulation . An additional goal examine symptom depression might influence affective response exercise , relationship affective response exercise exercise behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Tailored Activity Goals - Exercise Prescription Study
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim follow : Aim 1 . The first aim determine effectiveness experimental manipulation individual ' affective response laboratory-supervised bout exercise correspond vigorous intensity ( ventilatory threshold ) , compare control condition simply measure individual ' natural affective response exercise . The investigator specifically determine effect manipulation anticipate , experience remembered affective response exercise . Aim 2 . The second aim examine individual ' adherence exercise prescription course one week ask exercise daily twenty minute intensity ( indicated heart rate monitor ) laboratory-supervised exercise session , determine whether adherence prescription great expect exercise lead positive affect expect exercise lead negative affect , compare control condition . Aim 3 . The third aim examine potential mediator moderator relationship anticipate affect subsequent exercise behavior , include volitional control exercise , affect regulation ability , symptoms depression .
DOC.criteria: eligible participant age 18 39 ( men ) 18 45 ( woman ) free overt disease ( cleared clinical translational research center medical staff ) free mental health condition depression anxiety ( selfreport ) physically capable engage moderate exercise activity ( i.e. , injury physical impairment ) willing receive `` prescription '' exercise intensity , frequency , duration , access computer Internet connectivity order complete online followup survey . elite ( i.e. , pay ) athlete require participate aerobic exercise conjunction occupation ( e.g. , aerobics instructor ) woman must pregnant plan become pregnant study period medication exercise contraindicate ( cleared clinical translational research center medical staff ) smoker
